title: Pixel 2 awful audio recording still not solve in third party apps ?
content:
Pixel 2 has been out for more than one year and the awful audio recording in third party applications is still not solve while it's been aknowledged by Google for one year :
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/forum/AAAAb4-OgUssS6fJLYymXA/?hl=by

Could we, please, have more information and know if this issue is still being investigated ?
